title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 245.4 - Timing requirements for CSAPR SO[2] Group 1 allowance allocations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 245.4 - Timing requirements for CSAPR SO[2] Group 1 allowance allocations

State Regulations
(a) By December 1, 2015, the department will
submit to the Administrator, in a format prescribed by the Administrator, the
CSAPR SO
2

Group 1 allowance allocations determined in
accordance with section
245.3
of this part, for the 2017
and 2018 control periods. (b) By

June 1, 2017, the department will submit to the Administrator, in a format
prescribed by the Administrator, the CSAPR SO
2

Group 1
allowance allocations determined in accordance with section
245.3
of this part for the 2019 and
2020 control periods. (c) By June 1, 2019 and June 1st of each year thereafter, the department will submit to the

Administrator, in a format prescribed by the Administrator, the CSAPR
SO
2

Group 1 allowance allocations determined in
accordance with section
245.3
of this part for the control
period in the fourth year following the year of the submission
deadline. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
245.4

Adopted

New

York State Register December 2, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 48, eff. 12/12/2015

Adopted

New

York State Register December 19, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 51, eff. 1/2/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
